title: 服务器启动失败
author: 潜伏丶
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-11-3 10:13 编辑 
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release
Loading libraries, please wait...

replies.author: Karlatemp
replies.txt_content: 看上去像是核心缺少东西，尝试重新下个核心？

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-548550-1-1.html
1.按照这里改开服bat；
2.更新你的Java或者服务器系统，这毛病似乎多见于旧版Java和系统。

replies.author: 潜伏丶
replies.txt_content:

现在解决了 更换了核心文件就行了  官网下载的核心有问题。。

replies.author: 潜伏丶
replies.txt_content:
Karlatemp 发表于 2019-11-3 07:41
